underlying_goal: To improve the writing style of a paper by removing 'hedging' language, based on project guidelines.
primary_success: Claude effectively used parallel agents to review different sections of the paper for hedging violations simultaneously, consolidating the findings into a single report and then applying all fixes.
brief_summary: The user wanted to remove weak 'hedging' language from a paper. Claude first found several instances, then scaled the search by spawning four parallel agents to review different sections of the paper. It consolidated the findings and applied all nine identified fixes to make the language more assertive and direct.
